website_summaries.verdict: The Brooks PureCadence 7 is a stability running shoe that was recommended by the majority of the runners who have tried it. Many of them appreciated the feeling of lightness it provided on short and long-distance runs. Aside from the healthy individuals, users who have experienced knee pain and blisters with the previous models gave recognition to the shoes’ comfort, support, and responsiveness. Overall, the Brooks PureCadence 7 made a lot of users happy and satisfied because of its great-looking design and excellent performance.
pros: Majority of the purchasers mentioned that the PureCadence 7 is a lightweight running shoe
It has a snug fit, according to some reviews
Many users mentioned that the shoe was comfortable
They did not experience knee pain and blisters with this version
A lot of runners agreed that the Brooks PureCadence 7 performed well on short and long-distance runs
Some users mentioned that it was supportive
A runner said that he felt like "running on air" with this pair of shoes
According to some reviewers, they loved its padded tongue
A handful of users said that the style was great
This running shoe runs true to size
The shoe has an affordable price
cons: A purchaser commented that the width of the shoe was too tight for him
Several testers observed that the Brooks PureCadence 7 has limited color options available

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I run about 15-20 miles per week and have used Brooks PureCadence since model 1. Models 1 to 4 were great. I like the lower heel and the overall padding. The PureCadence 7 has corrected the issues they introduced with version 5 by making the upper and tongue softer and seemed to widen the toe box a bit. The sole is firm and provides good support. Version 7 seems to run about 1/4 size smaller than before--not enough for me to change size, but if you were snug before, it may be tight.
customer_reviews.author: EP Review

customer_reviews.title: Back to the future.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a couple of pairs of cadence every year. Last couple of years were a bit of a bust and the shoes felt poorly built. The pair I have bought this time (7) look and feel great - back to how they used to feel. I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Billjonn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ran in Brooks for years now! Great quality shoe! I use this model for apples training and races. Having flat feet, these do the job. Only downfall is your only going to get about 250 miles out of them before they become yard shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brooks hits it out of the park again with this iteration of the Pure Cadence series-I've used this series of shoe for years and this one is yet another durable and comfortable road/trail hybrid shoe. The shoe itself is very well-made and has plenty of tread, making it great on rocky trails and has *just* enough cushion to prevent injury. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John Luke Ragin

customer_reviews.title: good cushioning and arch support for my almost flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I like brooks they are comfortable and have the right amount of support.for me. What I didn't like is that they took away the support straps on the side that the older model had. They were directly tied into the lacing and made the shoes fit more securely in my opinion. Still very fine shoes I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: part time runner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, too bad they cancelled it.
customer_reviews.text: I wore the Pure Cadence for almost ten years. It was a great combination of low drop minimal feel with support. Over the years it got a little boring and standard, but I was still sad when they dropped it. Take a look at the Saucony Liberty ISO as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: NN Bromell

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of minimalist running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes to run about 20 miles a week. They are lightweight and provide just the right amount of support for me. I am about average weight with a BMI in the normal range. Probably best for small to medium sized runners. I used to wear shoes with more support (and weight) but was delighted to find my knees and feet felt great in these lighter shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H. North

customer_reviews.title: First time with Brooks, Perfect Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best shoes I’ve ever put on. There’s like an arch inside the sole and it just contours into your foot. I have another pair of Nikes that I run with. Can’t compare.. These are awesome. It was kinda weird to have the “toe box” so much space at the top for your toes but, after awhile I got use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Pure Cadence 7 are Definitely a Win!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Brooks Pure Cadence 7! Some have said the toe box is too big, but I really love the fit. It allows your foot to do what it's supposed to do naturally!
customer_reviews.author: lcj0811

customer_reviews.title: An absolute steal
customer_reviews.text: I went through 3 pairs of the PureCadence 6. Trusted race day performance at any distance including a pair of marathons. Versus the previous model, more or less the same fit. Gearing up for 2 marathons and an Ultra soon, these will likely be my go to. As of march 2019 roughly $70 is n absolute steal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support and ground feel
customer_reviews.text: I do bootcamp workouts almost daily. Running is just a warm up. This shoe has great support without thick cushioning. A great shoe to feel the floor while lifting and balancing, but still comfortable to run. I also like it better than my previous Cadence 6 shoe. Runs way better than Metcons for me, and better for lifting than Pureflows.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Real comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they feel good for walking and are a nice color that is not too bright and neon colored like a lot of sneakers. I normally where an 8 1/2 size shoe, but the size 9 of this Brooks fit nicely. So you might need to order a 1/2 size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great all around daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th PureCadence shoe, I bought series 3, 4, 5, 6, and this is 7. The fit and comfort is superb for me where I am on my feet most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: RadDad

customer_reviews.title: A WELL MADE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: Well made however, a little too narrow for me. A tight fit when I need to use my orthotics, If you need the same I would be sure & opt for another i/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: les goodman

customer_reviews.title: my second favorite model
customer_reviews.text: For me, it fits well, with adequate toe room. General comfort is good. All-in-all I slightly prefer the Adrenaline 19 model which fells like it has a little more height and cushion in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: No wide variant. Skip these if you need that.
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't a wide variant available so I purchased the only option in my size. It was a mistake. They are very narrow and while the material has excellent give, it's not enough to accommodate my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: PureCotton cotton
customer_reviews.text: Brooks are simply the best athletic shoes that I’ve ever worn to my recollection. It’s almost as nothing is there. I feel free to run as many miles as I want or just to walk around doing everyday activities. Simply put they’re wonderful & I’m sticking with brooks until they disappoint so far they’ve exceeded my expectation by a mile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfectly fine running shoe. Low drop and support for low arches which is what I was looking for. I wear a 9 in dress shoes and 10.5 in running shoes. The 10.5 in these fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good LightWeight Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have an arthritic left big toe that requires a loose fit. I have found the Brooks Pure Cadence series to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: TexasHonda

customer_reviews.title: You know who you are--that's why you buy Brooks
customer_reviews.text: You have high arches and slightly crooked feet. This is the one shoe that consistently fits. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Running on these or their predecessors for about 8 years. Best show I’ve ever run in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a defect with the right shoe as it causes my heel to bleed , shoes run small
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but good cushion
customer_reviews.text: Durable, cushioned, great for running on hard road. Also lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: Just like my PureCadence 6
customer_reviews.text: Fit and feel just like my PureCadence 6. Sole and support is almost identical. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Item was described accurately
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present for my husband; he runs on a daily basis and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brooks is always the best choice
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, lightweigt and provides appropriate support. Breathable top material and study sole for running on treadmill or blacktop.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barthen

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for proners
customer_reviews.text: have been using pure cadence since 2013. consistent feel and design from day one
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mizrachi

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Been wearing Brooks Pure Cadence for years!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product! Great looks, fit and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: James C Poag Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of the shoe. I ran only 2miles, but they're what I expect out of Brooks shoes.
customer_reviews.author: charles johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Pure Cadence. Well built shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for flat feet or low arch.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. It will become my go to shoes for work and everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Joe07

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think the inner curve is unneeded. Just make it flat and have customers buy insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Brooks yet
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing Adrenaline for the past seven pairs. Wanted a shoe with less drop. These Pure Cadence have a very similar arch to the Adrenaline. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Confortable, Light
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Good arch support,light, fit well, comfortable walking/running shoes
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (for me)
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in Pure Cadence since they first appeared. Missed out 3, 4 and 6, but the 7 is the 4th version I've used and, for my taste, it's the best. They fit me perfectly and they're a real pleasure to run in. They're a bit of a compromise, perhaps - minimalist with a hint of stability but, as an orthotic wearer, they really do the business for me. Pure Cadence have got me away from my old heavy heel-strike and now the whole foot is more involved in the running action. It's such a personal thing; they may not suit everybody but they're perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Blenkinsop

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's PureCadence 7 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The only shoe that offers full-body support in a lightweight and flexible design, the PureCadence 7 uses our innovative Guide Rails support system to keep your body aligned with every step. The flexible sole is designed to disperse the impact away from the body to provide a soft feel underfoot. The upper in Woven Air fabric and the soft internal reinforcement allow your foot to feel comfortable and free to move.
